patterns: Is it Mandatory to punch in and out both?
responses: Yes, It is mandatory. If you don't punch either in the morning or evening or both then attendance for the day will be considered as absent.

patterns: When are you guys open
what are your hours
hours of operation
responses: We are open 7am-4pm Monday-Friday!

patterns: What are the shift timings here
How will i know my shift timings
Hours of operation
responses: We have 2 shift timings.

patterns: Is shuttle available for interns
what are timings of shuttle
hours of operation
responses: Shuttle facility is available for all the employees
Shuttle is available from 8:30-10:30 in the morning and 5:30-7:30 in the evening.

patterns: What are the timings for shuttle?
responses: Morning 8:30 am to 10:30 am and Evening 5:50 pm to 8:00pm and 9:00 pm

patterns: What is the route for shuttle?
responses: Botanical Garden to Office (visa versa)

patterns: Are there any charges for shuttle?
responses: No

patterns: What is the boarding location for shuttle in the morning?
responses: Botanical Garden

patterns: What is the boarding location for shuttle in the evening?
responses: Office Gate

patterns: What is the process for attendance?
responses: Punch access card / Biometric

patterns: Is it important to both punch in and punch out?
responses: Yes

responses: Supervisor will send email to IT help desk and HRBP

patterns: How will the attendance regularize?
responses: Update regularization in I-Connect and get approval from supervisor

patterns: How many early leavings are allowed?
responses: There is no specific limit, however manager approval required for each early leaving.

patterns: What is the time for early leave?
responses: after 7 working hour

patterns: What is the time for late coming?
responses: login within 1 hour after your shift start time

patterns: Are leaves applicable on  monthly basis or yearly basis?
responses: Leaves credits last day of month

responses: Contact IT helpdesk and provide required approval

responses: 1 paid course at a time and multiple free course
Platform to learn and upskill yourself

patterns: What is iconnect?
responses: portal for employee to access Company Policy, Manage Leaves, Organizational structure, Performance management etc.

patterns: How to login into iconnect?
responses: with your email id and system password

patterns: How to use shared drive?

patterns: How can we take a printout?
responses: Login with your credential and take printout

responses: Iconnect - Attendance & Leave - Leave Balance

patterns: I sit in ETT, where can I meet my HR Spoc?

patterns: Who is my HR Spoc?
responses: It was informed at the time of Induction (day of joining), or contact your manager for details

patterns: Do I need to regularize my early leaving also?
responses: No, Not required

patterns: How many regularization can I do in a month?
responses: There is no specific limit for regularization in a month

patterns: Is late coming also regularized?
responses: Yes

patterns: Where can I see my pay slip?
responses: login @ https://myapps.microsoft.com/infoedge.com Select 'My Pay' app

patterns: I forgot to apply leave in last month, Can I apply now?
I Have forgot to apply my leaves/Ro last month, how can I do it know?
responses: Yes, you can apply for leave till 15th of next month
you can apply for leave before 15th of next month, if salary deducted you will

patterns: What is Midyear Review?
responses: your half year performance review with reporting manager against set goals

patterns: Do I get rating in Midyear Review
responses: Yes

patterns: Who is my Mediclaim Spoc?
responses: You will receive email from HR, in case of any change in Medicalim spoc

patterns: I have 6 days working days. How many leaves will be counted if I take leave from Friday till Monday
responses: 4 days leave (provided you have sufficient leave balance)

patterns: How can I see my old appraisal forms?
responses: Iconnect - Performance Management

patterns: What are Competences in Appraisal form?
What are competencies in our KRA (s)?
responses: Collaboration & Team Work,Focus on Results,Customer Focus,Execution Excellence,Communication,Intrapreneurial Orientation,Innovation and Openness to Learning

patterns: Where can I add my PAN Card details on Iconnect?
responses: Iconnect - Personal Information - Update PAN & Bank Account

patterns: What all things can I do in Iconnect?
responses: you can access Org. structure, your personal information, policies and documents, your performance management, Attendance & Leave, Helpdesk and exit management

patterns: What is Klib?
responses: Klib is online library, from where you can borrow books to read

patterns: My leaves are not approved yet, will their be any deduction in my salary?
responses: Yes, you salary will be deducted for the not approved days

patterns: I am aligned with incorrect team on I connect, please correct it.
When can I apply for an IJP and what is the procedure?
My office I-Card is damaged/lost how can I get a new one?
I want to change my shift timings?
responses: Contact your manager and HRBP

patterns: As per holiday calender 10th March is a holiday, is this for Mumbai as well?
Where I have see holiday calender on I connect?
responses: Iconnect - Policies&Documents - Policies - Holiday Calender 2020

patterns: I have more than 4 late comming in this month, will my salary get deducted?
responses: 3 late coming is allowed and on 4th late coming Half day leave will be consumed, if you don’t have leave balance then your half day salary will be deducted

patterns: There is a mismatch in my salary credited vs expected, whome to contact?
Helpdesk of tax, salary related queries?
responses: Contact 'infoedge.payrollhelpdesk@myndsol.com' for any query related to tax and salary issues

patterns: I want support in applying for medical insurance?
responses: Contact Mediclaim helpdesk number, if you don’t have helpdesk number please contact your manager or HRBP for details

patterns: Why my leave balace has been debited, I havn't taken any leaves?
responses: It might be due to more than 3 late coming, please contact your manager and HRBP for more details

patterns: Were I have give suggetion/feedback related to admin/infra/HR/manager?
responses: Email to your Manager / HRBP / Admin

patterns: My Manager is on leaves, from where can I get my leaves approved on I-connect?
responses: Contact your HRBP and Skip for leave approval

patterns: I want to know the stauts on IJP i have applied for.
responses: The result of the interview discussion will be shared over an Email by the recruiter

patterns: I want to withdraw PPF, how can I do it?
responses: Login to PF account with UAN and apply online

patterns: I want to understand my salary structure
responses: login @ https://myapps.microsoft.com/infoedge.com then select 'My Pay' app

patterns: What is the amount assured for my family members?
responses: It is as per work level, please reffer policy for more details

patterns: What is the procedure for cashless mediclaim?
Who will be the contact person for the claim at the time of hospitalization?
responses: Contact your TPA helpdesk, and follow the procedure

patterns: Can we upgrade our policy in between the financial year?
responses: No, you can upgrade at the time of renewal or date of joining (which is later)

patterns: What are the flexi plans and their details?
What are the emergency help/benefits provided to employees like medical, facility?
What are the categories under mediclaim policies like meternity, surgery, etc.?
What is the category-wise amount bifurcation under cashless policy?
responses: Please refer mediclaim policy for detail at Iconnect - Policies and Documents  - Infoedge Policies and procedure

patterns: What is the procedure for Voluntary Employee Provident Fund (VPF)?
responses: login @ https://myapps.microsoft.com/infoedge.com and then select 'My Pay' app, apply for VPF as per your choice

patterns: What is the procedure to withdraw EPF?
responses: Login to PF account with UAN and apply online

patterns: Who is the first person to raise the complaint of POSH?
responses: You should register your complaint with the internal committee by writing an email at 'POSH@naukri.com'

patterns: In IJP, can I apply for position of my next work level?
responses: Job will be posted with defined WLs. You can apply for roles which are at your current WL or at 1 level above.

patterns: Will my IJP application be kept confidential?
responses: Yes, your application will be kept confidential throughout the Interview Process. Only if and when you get selected for the position applied for, and you accept, will the information be shared with your manager.

patterns: Is there any cooling period between IJP applications?
responses: There is no cooling period between IJP applications

patterns: Who all are a part of Interview panel in IJP?
responses: Interview Panel comprises of HR Business Partner, Hiring Manager and Business Head of the open position

patterns: Can I change my decision on movement post I have accepted the role change from applied IJP?
responses: Once accepted, you are expected to comply with the movement decision

patterns: What is comp Off?
What is Compensatory Leave?
responses: Comp Off is a leave, which you get on working on your off day

patterns: How can I generate Compensatory Off?
responses: By working on your off day (except special leave).

patterns: Can I get comp off by working on my special leave?
Can I take 2 special leaves in a year?
My Birtdhay / Anniversary is on weekend, can I take leave on other working day?
responses: No

patterns: By when can we use our comp off?
responses: Within 2 months

patterns: What is special leave?
Why it is called as special leave?
responses: Birthday / Anniversary Leave is consider as special leave
No deduction from your earned leave balance

patterns: What is Referral bonus?
responses: You earn when your referred candidate join Infoedge and complete 90 days

patterns: Which is the nearest metro station?
responses: Botanical Garden
